BaKoMa TeX includes several packages 
compound with Type3 fonts:

public:

ar		-> port
barcodes	-> port
clock		-> port
esvect		-> ctan - Already coming with Type1 fonts in CTAN
nicefram	-> more2
oval		-> l209
ulsy		-> port
xypic
yannis		-> fonts\yannisgr (was in language/greek)

bakoma: (see fonzoo directory...)

astrosym
la
lams
latex
loggates
malvern
moonphase
script
suetterl
timing
twcal
va
